definition: each one does what he thinks is right (idiom)/each goes his own way
each/every
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
his/her/its/their/that/such/it (refers to sth preceding it)
is/are/am/yes/to be

sentences.english: When the person in power is absent, people will do as they like.
sentences.chinese: 當領導不在時，人們將會各行其是。

sentences.english: You shall not do there the things we do here this day, every man that which seemeth good to himself.
sentences.chinese: 你們不要照我們今日在這裏所行的，各行其是。

sentences.english: Especially, it is not easy to standardize or unify, so that the translator does as he likes.
sentences.chinese: 譯者往往各行其是，難於規範及統一。

definition: to do things each in one's own way
to act as one thinks fit/to have one's own way
subordination/line of command
to pass the buck/to shirk responsibility
to go one's own way (idiom); to act independently without asking others
each sticks to his own opinion (idiom); chacun son gout
mutually shirking responsibilities (idiom); each blaming the other/passing the buck to and fro/each trying to unload responsibilities onto the other
as rivers Jing and Wei separate clearly (idiom)/to be entirely different
each sticks to his own view (idiom); a dialogue of the deaf
to work with a common purpose (idiom); to make concerted efforts/to pull together/to work as one
to be united in action
to fail to meet each other/to conflict with each other/to be at odds with
to conflict with/to contradict/contradiction
to oppose/to set sth against/to be antagonistic to/antithetical/relative opposite/opposing/diametrical
lit. if he orders you go, he forbids you stop (idiom); fig. to demand exact compliance with instructions/to ensure strictly obedience
to keep on the right side of everyone (idiom)/warm and affable
